SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Album
Represents a user's photo album.
AlbumController
Controller associated with Album.fxml.
BulkController
Controller for the home page.
CreateAlbumController
Controller for the album creation interface.
DestinationController
Controller for the destination album selection interface.
ListViewController
Controller for a ListViewDialog of sorts that displays a list of all currently-existing "admin-approved" users.
LogoutController
Controller for the logout confirmation interface.
OptionsController
Controller for the photo options view, or Options.fxml.
Photo
Represents a photo object with path, captions, tags and date of capture.
Photos
This is where the photo application begins.
PhotosController
Controller for the login, admin, and stock pages of the Photos application.
PlacingController
Controller for placing a photo into another album by copying or transferring it.
SearchController
Controller for the search interface.
ShowOffController
Controller for displaying a fuller, separate view of a selected photo.
StockController
Controller for the stock album view (Stock.fxml) Displays predefined stock photos.
Users
Central model class for managing all user-related data, including users list, albums and photos for each user, and user-defined tag types, which are all serialized and deserialized here, for the purpose of data persistence.
